r.s: A Class the facillitates the search of filesystems
r.d: File_Find, created as a replacement for its Perl counterpart, also named File_Find, is a directory searcher, which handles, globbing, recursive directory searching, as well as a slew of other cool features.Â
r.n: * search() can now be called statically (bug #2132) * search() can now optionally match only against filename only (req #712) * fixes problems with directories named 0 (bug #2773)
